data.title: Sparky routing bug fixes to wrong agent
data.description: Issue #136 (data integrity bug fix) was routed to IntelligentIssueAgent instead of IssueFixerAgent, causing method signature error. Agent routing recommendations are ignored.
data.context: IntelligentIssueAgent._handle_complex_issue() takes 2 positional arguments but 3 were given
data.expected: Bug fixes should automatically route to IssueFixerAgent
data.actual: All issues default to IntelligentIssueAgent regardless of type
